name: Perpetuum Fitting Tool
short_description:
PFT is an advaned fitting tool inspired by EFT for the MMO perpetuum (perpetuum-online.com) that is currently in the development phase. 

The tool will be capable of calculating all this information based on extensions, sparks, robot/item bonus, NEXUS modules.

It will support a plugin architecture which can be used to show anything from additional useful information to a completely customized display for a certain bot.

It will also eventually support simulations facing your fits off against eachother in different situations.
